AF.content: archival technē overflows singularity of event, i.e. the answering machine that outlives its moment of recording, the ghost speaks
AF.linkedContent: archival technē overflows singularity of event, i.e. the answering machine that outlives its moment of recording, the ghost speaks

LOBL.content: terribleness of la chose, not only ineffable, unnarratable: it’s interdictory, it forbids telling/seeing
LOBL.linkedContent: terribleness of la chose, not only ineffable, unnarratable: it’s interdictory, it forbids telling/seeing

LOBL.content: interdiction violated by itself, sets in motion a single pas, overflows impossible récit, that which forbids happens [French? arriver?]
LOBL.linkedContent: interdiction violated by itself, sets in motion a single pas, overflows impossible récit, that which forbids happens [French? arriver?]

VM.content: for Levinas, ethics, morality, is first philosophy; though Plato and Descartes thought the overflowing of infinity, only Levinas thought infinity as the face
VM.linkedContent: for Levinas, ethics, morality, is first philosophy; though Plato and Descartes thought the overflowing of infinity, only Levinas thought infinity as the face

VM.content: Idea in Kantian sense [Husserl] as infinite overflowing of horizon, never equal to intuition of an object, even God’s intuition [?]
VM.linkedContent: Idea in Kantian sense [Husserl] as infinite overflowing of horizon, never equal to intuition of an object, even God’s intuition [?]

VM.content: wasn’t it Husserl who showed us that vision, perception were inadequate, the infinite overflowing of horizons? did he really reduce this inadequation to condition of available objects?
VM.linkedContent: wasn’t it Husserl who showed us that vision, perception were inadequate, the infinite overflowing of horizons? did he really reduce this inadequation to condition of available objects?

VM.content: thought that seeks to go to its very end in its language, the end envisaged under name of finitude, should abandon words & themes of finite/infinite & everything they govern > this is the impossible of beyond metaphysics which confirms necessity for this incommensurable overflow to take support from metaphysics
VM.linkedContent: thought that seeks to go to its very end in its language, the end envisaged under name of finitude, should abandon words & themes of finite/infinite & everything they govern > this is the impossible of beyond metaphysics which confirms necessity for this incommensurable overflow to take support from metaphysics

VM.content: Heidegger realized this in making difference [btwn Being & existent] fundamental
VM.linkedContent: Heidegger realized this in making difference [btwn Being & existent] fundamental

PP.content: knowledge, epistēmē, antidote: remaining measured against hubris, cet entraînment démesuré qui emporte l’être dans le simulacre, le masque et la fête
PP.linkedContent: knowledge, epistēmē, antidote: remaining measured against hubris, cet entraînment démesuré qui emporte l’être dans le simulacre, le masque et la fête

PP.content: pharmakon is liquid (opposites pass more easily btwn each other), water [see Laws on protecting water], everything in sperm which overflows wastefully (se dépense sans réserve) [living speech: non-diverted seminal potency]
PP.linkedContent: pharmakon is liquid (opposites pass more easily btwn each other), water [see Laws on protecting water], everything in sperm which overflows wastefully (se dépense sans réserve) [living speech: non-diverted seminal potency]

POO.content: exemplarity: “example itself, as such, overflows its singularity as much as its identity”
POO.linkedContent: exemplarity: “example itself, as such, overflows its singularity as much as its identity”

POOF.content: that which is empty resembles that which overflows: plus de sens, desert mirage effect
POOF.linkedContent: that which is empty resembles that which overflows: plus de sens, desert mirage effect

T.content: exteriority & alterity (by themselves) do not surprise philosophy > the overflow is [philosophy’s] object
T.linkedContent: exteriority & alterity (by themselves) do not surprise philosophy > the overflow is [philosophy’s] object

T.content: a limitrophic violence imprinted by new types > 1) overflows and cracks (déborde et fait craquer), count in margins more or less than what’s said/read, déferlement qui tient à la structure de la marque [same word as limit, marche, marge] 2) luxate the pretensions to univocal rigidity [vanne ouverte à une double entente ne formant plus un seul système]
T.linkedContent: a limitrophic violence imprinted by new types > 1) overflows and cracks (déborde et fait craquer), count in margins more or less than what’s said/read, déferlement qui tient à la structure de la marque [same word as limit, marche, marge] 2) luxate the pretensions to univocal rigidity [vanne ouverte à une double entente ne formant plus un seul système]

P.content: frame overflowed on 2 borders by what it overflows: it travaille [labors, gives, plays, see TN.] indeed; Kant is undoing the labor of the frame; the structurally bordered origin of surplus value creaks and cracks like wood, never fully exposed
P.linkedContent: frame overflowed on 2 borders by what it overflows: it travaille [labors, gives, plays, see TN.] indeed; Kant is undoing the labor of the frame; the structurally bordered origin of surplus value creaks and cracks like wood, never fully exposed

P.content: an object is “prodigious,” monstrous (not colossal), when, by size, it annihilates & reduces to nothing the end which constitutes its concept, exceeds the final limit, overflows end & concept
P.linkedContent: an object is “prodigious,” monstrous (not colossal), when, by size, it annihilates & reduces to nothing the end which constitutes its concept, exceeds the final limit, overflows end & concept

P.content: colossal is almost too (presque trop) large for presentation: singular originality w/out edging (bordure) or simple overspill (débordement) > how can we think of this “almost too,” this incised in excess
P.linkedContent: colossal is almost too (presque trop) large for presentation: singular originality w/out edging (bordure) or simple overspill (débordement) > how can we think of this “almost too,” this incised in excess

OTO.content: [via Nietzsche] mother, who is living on, outlive me long enough to bury me, living on is the name of the mother, “this survival is my life whose shores she overflows”
OTO.linkedContent: [via Nietzsche] mother, who is living on, outlive me long enough to bury me, living on is the name of the mother, “this survival is my life whose shores she overflows”

GSP.content: Telos/Vorhaben > infinite theoretical anticipation & infinite practical task: Kantian Idea as project of phenom.? makes it possible by overflowing its system (as its end?) > doesn’t enclose genesis of Being & meaning—is structurally genesis itself: origin/becoming, birth of history
GSP.linkedContent: Telos/Vorhaben > infinite theoretical anticipation & infinite practical task: Kantian Idea as project of phenom.? makes it possible by overflowing its system (as its end?) > doesn’t enclose genesis of Being & meaning—is structurally genesis itself: origin/becoming, birth of history

CHM.content: doubt & Cartesian Cogito punctuated by “unprecedented” excess, overflows totality (beings, factual history, determined meanings)
CHM.linkedContent: doubt & Cartesian Cogito punctuated by “unprecedented” excess, overflows totality (beings, factual history, determined meanings)

CHM.content: to place w/in determined historical structure risks dulling point itself (doing violence)
CHM.linkedContent: to place w/in determined historical structure risks dulling point itself (doing violence)

REST.content: I meant “escape (évasion)” by overflowing pictorial limit, framed representation, visible immediacy (if any such thing exists, in the picture) w/ collar flared (au col évasé), half-inside out > isn’t this overflowing the discursive operation, from its very first word? or is its internal reason in pictorial structure? > question of structure of this limit, of being-in or being-out, question of supplement of parergon—once “escape” takes off (prendre son appel sur) from impoverished descriptive trait: no longer concerns a painting
REST.linkedContent: I meant “escape (évasion)” by overflowing pictorial limit, framed representation, visible immediacy (if any such thing exists, in the picture) w/ collar flared (au col évasé), half-inside out > isn’t this overflowing the discursive operation, from its very first word? or is its internal reason in pictorial structure? > question of structure of this limit, of being-in or being-out, question of supplement of parergon—once “escape” takes off (prendre son appel sur) from impoverished descriptive trait: no longer concerns a painting

REST.content: [re: the interlaced correspondence]: interminable overflowing of whole, la surenchère en plus-value de la correspondance débordante (subordante), occurs btwn general element (discourse, writing, painting) & particular determinate element > element worth more than whole, and whole plays the part [metonymy/synechdoche no longer what they are]
REST.linkedContent: [re: the interlaced correspondence]: interminable overflowing of whole, la surenchère en plus-value de la correspondance débordante (subordante), occurs btwn general element (discourse, writing, painting) & particular determinate element > element worth more than whole, and whole plays the part [metonymy/synechdoche no longer what they are]

REST.content: what’s essential for Heidegger is making the overflowing appear by “earth,” “shoes,” “world” > il faudrait les ressaisir à l’instant où le hors-d’usage détaché (relativement déstricturé) donne lieu, a sort of abyssal surplus value, une surenchère sans fond > we can speak of conditions of fetishization of product/work, surplus value forms a truth-effect, useless gives way to speculative exploitation, more than useful (plus qu’utile): useful for grasping usefulness of useful—call for adherence [cf. pp. 339-41 double/triple uselessness (work, product, useless for grasping usefulness)]
REST.linkedContent: what’s essential for Heidegger is making the overflowing appear by “earth,” “shoes,” “world” > il faudrait les ressaisir à l’instant où le hors-d’usage détaché (relativement déstricturé) donne lieu, a sort of abyssal surplus value, une surenchère sans fond > we can speak of conditions of fetishization of product/work, surplus value forms a truth-effect, useless gives way to speculative exploitation, more than useful (plus qu’utile): useful for grasping usefulness of useful—call for adherence [cf. pp. 339-41 double/triple uselessness (work, product, useless for grasping usefulness)]

REST.content: when the detached calls for reattachment: a discourse is sketched, maneuver to call for adherence
REST.linkedContent: when the detached calls for reattachment: a discourse is sketched, maneuver to call for adherence

PIO.content: shouldn’t an inaugural invention deny/overflow environment of reception (which shouldn’t be able to welcome an authentic invention)? thus producing a disordering mechanism for every status assignable to it? isn’t an invention spontaneously deconstructive?
PIO.linkedContent: shouldn’t an inaugural invention deny/overflow environment of reception (which shouldn’t be able to welcome an authentic invention)? thus producing a disordering mechanism for every status assignable to it? isn’t an invention spontaneously deconstructive?

RM.content: metaphor withdraws, it gets by w/out everything, withdraws at instant it overflows every limit, marking w/ supplementary trait one more turn, re-turn, re-tracing or retreat (re-trait)
RM.linkedContent: metaphor withdraws, it gets by w/out everything, withdraws at instant it overflows every limit, marking w/ supplementary trait one more turn, re-turn, re-tracing or retreat (re-trait)

ATM.content: no utterance ever cut from all context, context never annulled w/out remainder: one negotiates w/ les effets de bord, incl. nonnegotiable, that which overflows (déborde) all context
ATM.linkedContent: no utterance ever cut from all context, context never annulled w/out remainder: one negotiates w/ les effets de bord, incl. nonnegotiable, that which overflows (déborde) all context

ATM.content: what is said inside (dedans) can infinitely overflow all context, at a stroke (d’un coup)
ATM.linkedContent: what is said inside (dedans) can infinitely overflow all context, at a stroke (d’un coup)

ATM.content: [re: giving to EL w/out restitution] excess that overflows language sets it into motion at moment of traversing it > this traversal is not transgression (passage of a sharply dividing limit) > metaphor of overflowing no longer fits—too linear [?]
ATM.linkedContent: [re: giving to EL w/out restitution] excess that overflows language sets it into motion at moment of traversing it > this traversal is not transgression (passage of a sharply dividing limit) > metaphor of overflowing no longer fits—too linear [?]

LG.content: trait that marks membership (l’appartenance) divides > boundary (bordure) of set comes to form by invagination—an internal pocket larger than the whole
LG.linkedContent: trait that marks membership (l’appartenance) divides > boundary (bordure) of set comes to form by invagination—an internal pocket larger than the whole

LG.content: consequences of this division & overflowing (débordement) as singular as they are limitless (qu’illimitables)
LG.linkedContent: consequences of this division & overflowing (débordement) as singular as they are limitless (qu’illimitables)

LG.content: genre-clause (clause de genre): clin d’oeil, écluse (floodgate), clôture qui s’exclut de ce qu’elle inclut, déclasse ce qu’elle permet de classer > unfigurable figure of clusion, forme sans forme, neither sees day nor brings itself to light
LG.linkedContent: genre-clause (clause de genre): clin d’oeil, écluse (floodgate), clôture qui s’exclut de ce qu’elle inclut, déclasse ce qu’elle permet de classer > unfigurable figure of clusion, forme sans forme, neither sees day nor brings itself to light

LG.content: edge (bord), borderline (ligne de bordure), overflowing (débordement) do not arise w/out a fold—which figure of folding? [the answer: double chiasmatic invagination]
LG.linkedContent: edge (bord), borderline (ligne de bordure), overflowing (débordement) do not arise w/out a fold—which figure of folding? [the answer: double chiasmatic invagination]

OG.content: writing as “signifier of the signifier” no longer means accidental doubling, fallen (déchue) secondarity, but overflows, goes beyond extension of language > comprehends language
OG.linkedContent: writing as “signifier of the signifier” no longer means accidental doubling, fallen (déchue) secondarity, but overflows, goes beyond extension of language > comprehends language

OG.content: signified always already (toujours déjà) functions as signifier: effacing = overflowing
OG.linkedContent: signified always already (toujours déjà) functions as signifier: effacing = overflowing

OG.content: secondarity of writing effects all signifieds
advent of writing, advent of a play which effaces all those abris du hors-jeu (out-of-bounds shelters [transcendental signifieds]) that surveil field of language > destroying the concept sign
OG.linkedContent: advent of writing, advent of a play which effaces all those abris du hors-jeu (out-of-bounds shelters [transcendental signifieds]) that surveil field of language > destroying the concept sign

FS.content: attempt-to-write, moment of overflow (can’t be understand via voluntarism): when play of meaning overflows signification, which is always enveloped by limits of nature, life, soul
FS.linkedContent: attempt-to-write, moment of overflow (can’t be understand via voluntarism): when play of meaning overflows signification, which is always enveloped by limits of nature, life, soul

SPEC.content: death drive: être à l’oeuvre déjà (in PP), ça se sera écrit en silence—in speculative overflow
SPEC.linkedContent: death drive: être à l’oeuvre déjà (in PP), ça se sera écrit en silence—in speculative overflow

SPEC.content: PP loses mastery w/ flooding (Überschwemmung), no longer seeks pleasure, just binding
SPEC.linkedContent: PP loses mastery w/ flooding (Überschwemmung), no longer seeks pleasure, just binding

SPEC.content: power (posts) as transcendental predicate (not to be confused w/ death drive or repetition compulsion, gives us w/ what to describe them) > still, though borrowing descriptive traits from Bemächtigung, death drive & repetition compulsion overflow power > there is only differance of power, whence the posts, “will to power” [?]
SPEC.linkedContent: power (posts) as transcendental predicate (not to be confused w/ death drive or repetition compulsion, gives us w/ what to describe them) > still, though borrowing descriptive traits from Bemächtigung, death drive & repetition compulsion overflow power > there is only differance of power, whence the posts, “will to power” [?]

FV.content: what happens when a text that psychoanalysis deciphers inscribes w/in itself a scene of deciphering? when it says more about itself than the deciphering? [Freud often acknowledges this debt]
FV.linkedContent: what happens when a text that psychoanalysis deciphers inscribes w/in itself a scene of deciphering? when it says more about itself than the deciphering? [Freud often acknowledges this debt]

FV.content: débordement (not mastery of author), energetic squaring-off (carrure énergique)
FV.linkedContent: débordement (not mastery of author), energetic squaring-off (carrure énergique)

FV.content: literature that puts truth on stage, can it be read by psychoanalysis? abyssal structure, this space overflowed by powers of simulacrum
FV.linkedContent: literature that puts truth on stage, can it be read by psychoanalysis? abyssal structure, this space overflowed by powers of simulacrum

FV.content: [re: narrator identifying w/ Dupin in Purloined…] if dual relation btwn 2 doubles overflows & simulates symbolic: opposition imaginary/symbolic has little pertinence
FV.linkedContent: [re: narrator identifying w/ Dupin in Purloined…] if dual relation btwn 2 doubles overflows & simulates symbolic: opposition imaginary/symbolic has little pertinence

FV.content: position of each character identifies itself w/ the other & divides itself: even the position du mort (dummy) and of a supplementary 4th [beyond triangle] [all characters occupy all positions]
FV.linkedContent: position of each character identifies itself w/ the other & divides itself: even the position du mort (dummy) and of a supplementary 4th [beyond triangle] [all characters occupy all positions]
